teaser: A new report from Nobel prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz says measuring GDP is a poor way to track the recession. […]
title: GDP and Well-being
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

A new report from Nobel prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz says measuring GDP is a poor way to track the recession. Stephen Smith talks with Chief Economics Correspondent Chris Farrell about why.

","type":"text/html"},{"type":"text/html","content":"

contentencoded: A new report from Nobel prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz says measuring GDP is a poor way to track the recession. Stephen Smith talks with Chief Economics Correspondent Chris Farrell about why.
